analysis.summary: Vue component that renders an SVG arrow icon with configurable fill color and rotation angle.
analysis.purpose: Serve as a reusable navigation arrow icon throughout the application UI.

components.name: IconArrow
components.responsibility: Encapsulates an SVG element (with a <path>) to display an arrow; accepts props for fill color and rotation.

functions.name: defineProps
functions.description: Vue Composition API helper used to declare component props.

parameters.name: fill
parameters.description: Color to fill the arrow shape.

parameters.name: rotation
parameters.description: Rotation angle (in degrees) applied around the SVG center (24,24).

notes: No <style> block defined â€“ styling is entirely via props and inherited CSS variables.
SVG viewBox is 0 0 48 48 with pivot at (24,24) for proper centering on rotation.
Path data (d attribute) is hard-coded; to change arrow shape, update this path.
